name: Rhythmone Beacon
description: RhythmOne (formerly Burst Media) is a leading provider of advertising representation, services and technology to web publishers and online media companies. RhythmOne enables advertisers to reach finely segmented audiences across mobile and desktop devices. RhythmOne also offers RhythmXchange, a programmatically enabled platform that connects advertisers with web publishers by automating the buying and selling of online ads. RhythmOne firmly believes the privacy of web users must be protected. For more information, please visit RhythmOne's privacy policy.
